sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"证据，见证"之意。
means: proof ： 指足以直接证明某事为某事实的依据，侧重作为充分证据所导致的结果。
evidence ： 普通用词，在法律上指能起证明作用的，如证明、公证书以及所有的实物东西等。在生活中指任何一样可证明某一件事的真实性的东西。
witness ： 指证据或证人，尤指后者，且有亲眼见到之意。
testimony ： 指证据、证词，多系法律用语。

sentence.Network_en: His testimony, however, was only one in a salvo of new attacks.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而他的证词只是新一轮唇枪舌剑中的一股火力。

sentence.Network_en: Yesterday's testimony began on a note of passionate but civilized disagreement.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天的作供是在激烈但文明地表达分歧的氛围中开始的。

sentence.Network_en: The government decided that their testimony would be irrelevant to the case.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府认定他们的证词与案件不相关。

list.abs: relevant regulations 有关规定relevant testimony 有关证据relevant 有关的
法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 口头遗嘱 oral will 口头证供 oral testimony 口头证据 oral evidence.
其提供的意见称为专家证言（expert testimony）。其对案件有关问题提供的意见证据为专家证据（expert evidence）。
testimony 证据testimony experiment 证言实验testimony of eyewitness 目击证据

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin testimonium, from testis 'a witness'

entry.def: In a court of law, someone's testimony is a formal statement that they make about what they saw someone do or what they know of a situation, after having promised to tell the truth.

example.ex: His testimony was an important element of the Prosecution case...
example.tran: 他的证词是这宗公诉案件中的一个重要因素。

example.ex: Prosecutors may try to determine if Robb gave false testimony when he appeared before the grand jury.
example.tran: 检方可能要努力查证罗布在大陪审团面前是否作了伪证。

entry.def: If you say that one thing is testimony to another, you mean that it shows clearly that the second thing has a particular quality.

example.ex: This book is testimony to a very individual kind of courage.
example.tran: 这本书显示了个人非凡的勇气。

example.ex: Her living room is also her office, filled with desks, books, papers, a testimony to her dedication to her work.
example.tran: 她的客厅也是她的办公室，里面摆满了书桌、书籍和文件，充分证明了她的敬业精神。

means.word_mean: 1. a solemn statement made under oath
2. an assertion offering firsthand authentication of a fact;

sentences.sentence: "according to his own testimony he can't do it"
"his effort was testimony to his devotion"

auth_sentence.content: Even many Indian courts disallow the testimony it produces.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even many Indian courts disallow the testimony it produces.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even many Indian courts disallow the testimony it produces.

auth_sentence.content: The group cited testimony from witnesses, including doctors.
auth_sentence.res_content: The group cited testimony from witnesses, including doctors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The group cited testimony from witnesses, including doctors.

auth_sentence.content: Testimony...in no case discordant with that of the Iliad.
auth_sentence.res_content: Testimony...in no case discordant with that of the Iliad.

stems_affixes.word_buile: testi测试,试验,证据+mony表状态或物品→n.证据,证词;表明,说明

Sentence.sentence: The other's portrayal of Muir's life is a testimony to what it means to be lifelong learners and to use that learning to inform and bring about change
The jury believed the testimony of the two victims, who positively identified Jackson as the man who has attacked them.
Many factors influence the accuracy of eyewitness testimony

sentences.en: He was called in to bear testimony to what the police officer said.
sentences.cn: 他被传入为警官所说的话作证。

jushi.english: After listening to the testimony,the members of the jury delivered their verdict.
jushi.chinese: 听取证词后，陪审团的成员们做出了判决。
那个证人歪曲了他的证词。

jushi.english: Several men were called in to bear testimony to what the police officer said.
jushi.chinese: 数人被传入为警官所说的话作证。
